Verses: 1 thaaveedhum Avan Manusharum Moondraam Naalile, Siklaakukku Vandhu Serukiradharkulle, Amalekkiyar Thenpuraththuch Cheemaiyinmelum Siklaakin Melum Vizhundhu, Siklaakaik Kollaiyatiththu, Adhai Akkiniyaal Sutteriththu,
2 adhilirundha Sdhireekalaakiya Siriyavarkalaiyum Periyavarkalaiyum Siraipitiththu, Oruvaraiyum Kondrupotaamal, Avarkalaip Pitiththukkontu, Thangal Vazhiye Poivittaarkal.

3 thaaveedhum Avan Manusharum Andhap Pattanaththirku Vandhapodhu, Idho, Adhu Akkiniyinaal Sutterikkappattadhu Endrum, Thangal Manaivikalum Thangal Kumaararum Thangal Kumaaraththikalum Siraipitiththuk Kontupokappattaarkal Endrum Kantaarkal.
4 appozhudhu Thaaveedhum Avanotirundha Janangalum Azhukiradharkuth Thangalil Pelanillaamal Pokumattum Saththamittu Azhudhaarkal.
5 thaaveedhin Irantu Manaivikalaakiya Yesrayel Ooraalaana Akinovaamum, Karmel Ooraalaana Naapaalin Manaiviyaayirundha Apikaayilum, Siraipitiththukkontupokappattaarkal.

6 thaaveedhu Mikavum Nerukkappattaan; Sakala Janangalum Thangal Kumaaraththikalinimiththam Manakkilesamaanadhinaal, Avanaik Kalleriyaventum Endru Sollikkontaarkal; Thaaveedhu Than Thevanaakiya Karththarukkulle Thannaith Thitappatuththikkontaan.
7 thaaveedhu Akimelekkin Kumaaranaakiya Apiyaththaar Ennum Aasaariyanai Nokki: Epoththai Ennitaththil Kontuvaa Endraan; Apiyaththaar Epoththaith Thaaveedhinitaththil Kontuvandhaan.

8 thaaveedhu Karththarai Nokki: Naan Andhath Thantaip Pin Thotaraventumaa? Adhaip Pitippenaa? Endru Kettaan. Adharku Avar: Adhaip Pindhotar; Adhai Nee Pitiththu, Sakalaththaiyum Thiruppikkolvaai Endraar.
9 appozhudhu Thaaveedhum Avanotirundha Arunooruperum Ponaarkal; Avarkal Pesor Aatrantaikku Vandha Podhu Ange Silar Nindruponaarkal.
10 thaaveedho, Naanooruperotungootath Thotarndhuponaan; Irunooruper Vitaaiththupponapatiyinaal Pesor Aatraik Katakkamaattaamal Nindruponaarkal.
11 oru Ekipdhiyanai Veliyil Avarkal Kantu, Avanaith Thaaveedhinitaththil Kontuvandhu, Pusikka Avanukku Appamum Kutikkath Thanneerum Kotuththu,

12 aththippazha Ataiyin Oru Thuntaiyum, Vatralaana Irantu Thiraatchappazhak Kulaikalaiyum Avanukkuk Kotuththaarkal; Adhai Avan Saappitta Pinpu, Avanutaiya Uyir Thirumpa Avanukkul Vandhadhu. Avan Iraappakal Moondrunaalaai Appam Saappitaamalum Thanneer Kutiyaamalum Irundhaan.

13 thaaveedhu Avanai Nokki: Nee Yaarutaiyavan? Nee Evvitaththaan Endru Kettadharku, Avan: Naan Oru Amalekkiyanutaiya Velaikkaaranaakiya Ekipdhu Thesaththu Pillaiyaantaan; Moondru Naalaikkumun Naan Viyaadhippattapodhu, En Ejamaan Ennaik Kaivittaan.
14 naangal Kireththiyarutaiya Thenpuraththinmelum, Yoodhaavukkatuththa Ellaiyinmelum, Kaaleputaiya Thenpuraththinmelum, Pataiyetuththuppoi Siklaakai Akkiniyinaal Sutteriththuppottom Endraan.

15 thaaveedhu Avanai Nokki: Nee Ennai Andhath Thantinitaththukkuk Kontu Povaayaa Endru Kettadharku: Avan, Neer Ennaik Kondrupotuvadhumillai, Ennai En Ejamaan Kaiyil Oppukkotuppadhumillai Endru Thevanmel Aanaiyituveeraanaal, Ummai Andhath Thantinitaththukkuk Koottikkontu Poven Endraan.

16 ivan Avanaik Kontupoi Vittapodhu, Idho, Avarkal Veliyengum Paravi, Pusiththuk Kutiththu, Thaangal Pelisdhar Thesaththilum Yoodhaadhesaththilum Kollaiyittuvandha Makaa Peridhaana Andha Ellaak Kollaikkaakavum Aatippaatikkontirundhaarkal.
17 avarkalaith Thaaveedhu Andru Saayangaalandhotangi Marunaal Saayangaalamattum Muriya Atiththaan; Ottakangal Mel Eri Otippona Naanooru Vaalipar Thavira, Avarkalil Veroruvarum Thappavillai.
18 amalekkiyar Pitiththukkontu Pona Ellaavatraiyum, Thannutaiya Irantu Manaivikalaiyum, Thaaveedhu Vituviththaan.
19 avarkal Kollaiyaatikkontupona Ellaavatrilum, Siriyadhilum Periyadhilum, Kumaararilum, Kumaaraththikalilum, Ondrum Kuraipataamal, Ellaavatraiyum Thaaveedhu Thiruppikontaan.
20 ellaa Aatumaatukalaiyum Thaaveedhu Pitiththukkontaan; Avaikalaith Thangal Mirukajeevankalukku Munnaale Otti, Idhu Thaaveedhin Kollai Endraarkal.

21 vitaaiththupponadhinaale Thaaveedhukkup Pinsellaamal, Pesor Aatrantaiyile Thangiyirundha Irunooruperitaththukkuth Thaaveedhu Varukirapodhu, Ivarkal Thaaveedhukkum Avanotirundha Janaththirkum Edhirkontuvandhaarkal; Thaaveedhu Andha Janaththinitaththil Serndhu, Avarkal Sukaseydhiyai Visaariththaan.

22 appozhudhu Thaaveedhote Natandhu Vandha Manusharil Pollaadhavarkalum Peliyaalin Makkalumaana Ellaarum: Avarkal Engalote Varaadhapatiyinaal Naangal Thiruppikkonta Kollaiyutaimaikalil Avarkalukku Ondrum Kotuppadhillai; Avarkalil Ovvoruvanum Than Than Manaiviyaiyum Than Than Pillaikalaiyume Azhaiththukkontu Pokattum Endraarkal.

23 adharkuth Thaaveedhu: En Sakodharare, Karththar Namakkuth Thandhadhai Neengal Ippatich Cheyyaventaam; Karththar Nammaik Kaappaatri, Namakku Virodhamaai Vandhirundha Andhath Thantai Nammutaiya Kaiyil Oppukkotuththaar.

24 indhak Kaariyaththil Ungal Sorketka Yaar Sammadhippaan? Yuththaththirkup Ponavarkalin Pangu Evvalavo, Avvalavu Rasdhukkalantaiyil Irundhavarkalukkum Panguveedham Kitaikkaventum; Saripangaakap Pangituvaarkalaaka Endraan.
25 appatiye Annaalmudharkontu Natandhuvarukiradhu; Adhai Isravelile Innaalvaraikkum Irukkum Kattalaiyum Piramaanamumaaka Erpatuththinaan.

26 thaaveedhu Siklaakukku Vandhapodhu, Avan Kollaiyaatinavaikalile Than Sinekidharaakiya Yoodhaavin Moopparukkuch Chilavatrai Anuppi: Idho, Karththarutaiyasaththurukkalin Kollaiyil Ungalukku Untaayirukkum Aaseervaadhapaakam Endru Sollachchonnaan.
27 yaaryaarukku Anuppinaanendraal, Peththelil Irukkiravarkalukkum, Therkaana Raamoththil Irukkiravarkalukkum, Yaaththeeril Irukkiravarkalukkum,
28 aaroveril Irukkiravarkalukkum, Sipmoththil Irukkiravarkalukkum, Esdhemokaavil Irukkiravarkalukkum,
29 raakkaalil Irukkiravarkalukkum, Yeraamiyeliyarin Pattanangalil Irukkiravarkalukkum, Keniyarin Pattanangalil Irukkiravarkalukkum,
30 ormaavil Irukkiravarkalukkum, Koraasaanil Irukkiravarkalukkum, Aatraakil Irukkiravarkalukkum,
31 epronil Irukkiravarkalukkum, Thaaveedhum Avan Manusharum Natamaatina Ellaa Itangalil Irukkiravarkalukkum Anuppinaan.
